SEARCH
Package server.database.questionDatabase

Class Question

java.lang.Object
server.database.questionDatabase.Question
public class Question extends Object
The `Question` class represents a question entity with its associated properties. It includes an ID, type, question text, correct answer, and a list of possible answers.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tomasz Zbroszczyk

  • Field Summary

    private final String
    question
    The text of the question.
    private final String
    type
    The type or category of the question. 0 for question with predefined answers, 1 for question with user input.
